nl.cwts.publicationclassification

Class MultiLevelClustering

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.cwts.publicationclassification.MultiLevelClustering

  • public class MultiLevelClustering
extends java.lang.Object
    Multi-level clustering of a network.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MultiLevelClustering(nl.cwts.networkanalysis.Network network, nl.cwts.networkanalysis.IterativeCPMClusteringAlgorithm clusteringAlgorithm)
      Constructs a multi-level clustering of a network.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLevel(double resolution, double threshold)
      Adds a level to the multi-level clustering.
      void addLevel(double resolution, double threshold, boolean printInfo)
      Adds a level to the multi-level clustering.
      nl.cwts.networkanalysis.Clustering getClustering(int level)
      Returns the clustering of the network at a specific level of the multi-level clustering.
      int getNClusters(int level)
      Returns the number of clusters at a specific level of the multi-level clustering.
      int getNLevels()
      Returns the number of levels of the multi-level clustering.
      nl.cwts.networkanalysis.Clustering getReducedClustering(int level)
      Returns the clustering of the reduced network at a specific level of the multi-level clustering.
      nl.cwts.networkanalysis.Network getReducedNetwork(int level)
      Returns the reduced network at a specific level of the multi-level clustering.
      double getResolution(int level)
      Returns the value of the resolution parameter at a specific level of the multi-level clustering.
      double getThreshold(int level)
      Returns the minimum number of nodes per cluster at a specific level of the multi-level clustering.
      void removeLevel(int level)
      Removes a level and all higher (i.e., less granular) levels from the multi-level clustering.

                     double threshold,
                     boolean printInfo)

        threshold - Minimum number of nodes per cluster
        printInfo - Print progress and result information to the standard output

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Value of the resolution parameter is illegal.

        level - Level of the multi-level clustering
